DEBATE-SPEECH.TEXT: The next item is the report (A6 -0137/2005) by Mr Nassauer, on behalf of the Committee on Civil Liberties, Justice and Home Affairs, on the proposal for a directive of the European Parliament and of the Council on the prevention of the use of the financial system for the purpose of money laundering, including terrorist financing (COM(2004)0448 – C6 – 0143/2004 – 2004/0137(COD)).
